== IRC ==

=== Bot Owners ===

In charge of the channel bot. Bot Owners have complete and unlimited control over the bot and it's configuration files.

=== Bot Admins ===

Have near complete control over the bot and can command it to do nearly and IRC command.

=== Operators ===

Rarely given. Must have passed the Half-Ops role. Usually reserved for LoCo Admins.

=== Half-Ops ===

Usually given to Bot Admins in the event the bot is off-line and its functions need to be utilized to gain control over a channel. These members must have strong knowledge of IRC.

=== Meeting Drivers ===

These members are given the authority to drive the meetings. This includes setting meeting dates as well as officially starting and ending meetings.
